title: U.S. consumers who use marijuana 2017 , by household income
summary: This statistic shows the survey on <$30000 usage in the U.S. in 2017 .
According to the survey , 13 % of the respondents used an <$30000 , while 13 % did not .
9 % of respondents said they did n't $75000+ if they used <$30000 blocking software .
